specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick two friendly units within 6”. Those units get the Furious rule next time they charge.

specialRules.hint: Place a marker on this unit whenever it regenerates a wound. For each marker it gets +1A in melee.

specialRules.description: Place a marker on this unit whenever it regenerates a wound. For each marker it gets +1A in melee.

specialRules.hint: When in melee, may pick one model from the enemy unit and roll one die. On a 2+ it takes 1 hit with Deadly(3).

spells.name: Despair
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -2 to its next morale test.

spells.name: Blade Storm
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 4 automatic hits each.

spells.name: Darkness
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it’s wounded.

spells.name: Steal Soul
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits with AP(1).

spells.name: World of Pain
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately charge by up to 6” and gets +1 to hit for that melee.

spells.name: Black Bolt
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 3 automatic hits with AP(2).
